price: 49. Ogeysii addoomahayga inaan Anigu (waa Alle'e) ahay Denbi Dhaaf Badanaha, Naxariista Badan.
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
